title.narrative: Accountable Grant: Fostering Constructive Dialogues and Strengthening Knowledge Communities on Trade and Sustainable Development 2010-2012

description.narrative: This activity (Accountable Grant: Fostering Constructive Dialogues and Strengthening Knowledge Communities on Trade and Sustainable Development 2010-2012) is a component of 113342 reported by FCDO, with a funding type of 'Not for profit organisation' and a budget of £2,550,000. This component benefits Developing countries, unspecified, and works in the following sector(s): Trade policy and administrative management, Environmental policy and administrative management. , with the following implementing partners: International Centre for Trade and Sustainable Development. The start date is 30-06-2010 and the end date is 31-12-2011.
